name: Bowdoin College Virtual Field Trip to Giant's Stairs (Mar 2022)
name_original: Bowdoin College Virtual Field Trip to Giant's Stairs (Mar 2022)
description: Participate in a guided first-person POV laboratory at the Giant's Stairs of Casco Bay. Explore local rock formations and analyze geological and spatial aspects of the environment. Use in coordination with a blackboard survey. Version 3.0. Updated 3-9-2022.
